page.syntax: GenerateAddUserStatement as C (User as C, Password as C)
page.description: Generate a SQL Add User statement.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::GenerateAddUserStatement() Syntax SQL_Statement as C = SQL::Connection::GenerateAddUserStatement( User as C [, Password as C ] ) ArgumentDescription SQL_StatementAn add user group statement appropriate for the database. UserThe name of the user to create. PasswordOptional. Default = "". The database password.
Description The .GenerateAddUserStatement() method returns the SQL statement that will create the named user. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection conn.open("{A5API=Access,FileName='C:\Program Files\A5V8\MDBFiles\Alphasports.mdb',UserName='Admin'}") ? conn.GenerateAddUserStatement("Tom", "") = "CREATE USER Tom"
See Also SQL::Connection Object
